item.title: $\sigma$-Sets and $\sigma$-Antisets
item.description: arXiv:2501.00047v3 Announce Type: replace Abstract: In this paper we present a brief study of the $\sigma$-set-$\sigma$-antiset duality that occurs in $\sigma$-set theory and we also present the development of the integer space $3^{A}=\left\langle 2^{A}, 2^{A^{-}} \right\rangle$ for the cardinals $|A|=2,3$ together with its algebraic properties. In this article, we also develop a presentation of some of the properties of fusion of $\sigma$-sets and finally we present the development and definition of a type of equations of one $\sigma$-set variable.
item.dc:creator: Ivan Gatica, Alfonso Bustamente
